value.title: Austin Power BI User Group - Charticulator 101
value.excerpt: This Austin User Group presentation is all about the Basics of Charticulator. We also go through three demos of visual creations. 1. Build a fancy Bar chart mirroring what is done in desktop 2. Cool chart with stacked bars and scatter plot 3. Box and Whisker chart  Follow Mike on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/michaelcarlo/

ALM Toolkit provides the following features: - Database Compare - Code Merging - Easy Deployments - Source-Control

value.title: Aggregation to speed up the performance of a Power BI report even if all IMPORTED
value.excerpt: One of the questions I normally get after presenting about aggregations in Power BI is that, does the aggregation works only for Composite mode and in scenarios to speed up the DirectQuery? or does it work in import mode as well? This video is about this question and shows how you can speed up your model

value.title: Basic Sharing, and Manage Permissions in Power BI Simple, but Useful
value.excerpt: Power BI provides multiple ways of sharing content with users. Each sharing method has pros and cons and can be used for specific scenarios. value.title: Compare Period Over Period Breakdown in Power BI Using the Waterfall Chart
